text: ā nāṭukaḷuṭe vr̥ttāntaṅṅaḷil cilat nāṁ ninakk vivariccutarikayāṇ‌. avarilēkkayakkappeṭṭa dūtanmār vyaktamāya teḷivukaḷuṁ keāṇṭ avaruṭe aṭutt cellukayuṇṭāyi. enniṭṭuṁ mump avar niṣēdhiccu taḷḷiyirunnatil avar viśvasikkukayuṇṭāyilla. satyaniṣēdhikaḷuṭe hr̥dayaṅṅaḷinmēl aprakāraṁ allāhu mudravekkuṁ
